T02D1409:220b-12: 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams gcig tu yi ge ji lta
T02D1409:220b-13: ba bzhin du bsdams shing skyed par byed pas mkha'
T02D1409:220b-14: 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom zhes bya'o //
T02D1409:220b-15: 'di yang dang po'i don gyi gnyis pa'o //
T02D1409:220b-16: de lta bas na gsungs pa /
T02D1409:220b-17: bdag dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i
T02D1409:220b-18: 'khor lo gsum rnam par gnas pa zhes pa ni
T02D1409:220b-19: man ngag gi rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed
T02D1409:220b-20: par bya'o // mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang
T02D1409:220b-21: bzhin zhes pa ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs
T02D1409:220b-22: par bya'o // pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma so
T02D1409:220b-23: so'i sa bon gyi yi ge las byung ba'i sngags
T02D1409:220b-24: spyir sngags dang lha dag de'i bdag nyid kun du
T02D1409:220b-25: 'gro ma'i rang bzhin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1409:220b-26: man ngag gi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1409:220b-27: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dpal 'khor lo
T02D1409:220b-28: sdom pa'i sku yongs su gyur pa de'i bdag nyid
T02D1409:220b-29: kyi snying gar skad cig gis gzhal yas khang rnam
T02D1409:220b-31: de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D1409:220b-32: de'i lte ba la sna tshogs padma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:220b-33: de nas de'i lte ba la zla ba dang nyi
T02D1409:220b-34: ma'i dkyil du gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su
T02D1409:220b-35: gyur pa las zhal brgyad pa phyag bcu drug pa'o
T02D1409:220b-36: // de la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: h'um yongs
T02D1409:220b-37: su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje phag mo
T02D1409:220b-38: las byung ba sku mdog sngon po thod pa'i phreng
T02D1409:220b-39: bas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku phyag rgya drug dang
T02D1409:220b-40: // ldan pa'o // spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes
T02D1409:220b-41: mtshan pa ral pa'i cod pan la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1409:220b-43: g-yas brkyang bas 'jigs par byed pa dang /
T02D1409:220b-45: drag po chen po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag gi
T02D1409:220b-46: gtso bo dag gis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1409:220b-47: pa / rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa dpal
T02D1409:220b-48: bde mchog 'khor lo'i thugs kar byung ba'i bcom ldan
T02D1409:221a-4: de bzhin du g-yon skor gyis ser po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D1409:221a-5: du ba dang sngo bsangs dang /
T02D1409:221a-6: thal skya ste zhal gzhan rnams so //
T02D1409:221a-7: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i pags pa bshus nas rgyab tu phyar te bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-13: lcags kyu rnams g-yas kyi phyag drug na bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-14: de bzhin du g-yon gyi phyag drug na rim pa ji lta bar /
T02D1409:221a-20: sdigs mdzub rnams bsnams par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:221a-21: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma ni skra grol ba mdog dmar po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:221a-22: 'on kyang zhal gyi gtso bo dmar po g-yas sngo
T02D1409:221a-23: ba g-yon dkar po zhal gzhan ma lnga po bcom
T02D1409:221a-24: ldan 'das kyi zhal dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-25: lha mos mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D1409:221a-26: tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-27: phyag gzhan rnams na bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshon cha bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-28: dum bus brgyan pa'i ske rags can gcer bu thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1409:221a-29: pus mo gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D1409:221a-30: de bzhin du re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma dang
T02D1409:221a-31: bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D1409:221a-33: de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la ni yi ge aom
T02D1409:221a-34: las byung ba'i rab tu bsngags pa'i zhes bya ba'i
T02D1409:221a-35: mkha' 'gro ma ser mo zhal gsum pa /
T02D1409:221a-36: zhal gyi gtso bo yid tsam ser ba /
T02D1409:221a-39: byang gi 'dab ma la yi ge ba las rta rgod ma'i zhal can /
T02D1409:221a-40: ljang gu zhal gsum pa zhal gyi gtso bo ljang gu g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1409:221a-43: yi ge dza las skyes pa'i sin dh'ur grags pa
T02D1409:221a-44: zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo zhal gsum
T02D1409:221a-45: pa / zhal gyi gtso bo dkar po'o //
T02D1409:221a-48: lho'i 'dab ma la yi ge he las gdangs lta
T02D1409:221a-49: bu zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dmar mo zhal
T02D1409:221a-50: gsum pa zhal gyi gtso bo dmar ba /
T02D1409:221a-54: phyag rgya rnam pa lngas brgyan pa /
T02D1409:221b-1: ro'i steng du g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa phyag drug ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-2: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na mda' dang lcags kyu dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:221b-3: de bzhin du g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang
T02D1409:221b-4: zhags pa dang kha tv'am ga dang lhan cig par
T02D1409:221b-7: g-yas ngos su spyan zur gyis gzigs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:221b-8: mtshams bzhir gnas pa'i snod bzhi po byang chub kyi
T02D1409:221b-9: sems kyis yongs su gang zhing bum pa'i steng gi
T02D1409:221b-10: thod pa'o zhes bya ba ni nang gi rim pa'o
T02D1409:221b-11: // de'i rjes thogs su rim pa bar ma'i shar du yi ge he las he l'a sye ka'o //
T02D1409:221b-12: byang phyogs su yi ge ru las gdu bu can no //
T02D1409:221b-13: nub phyogs su yi ge ru las dung gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1409:221b-14: lho phyogs su yi ge kam las keng rus ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-15: me'i mtshams su yi ge h'um las h'um mdzad ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-16: bden bral du yi ge phat las phat yig ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-17: rlung gi phyogs su yi ge d'a las mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-18: dbang ldan du yi ge ki las gzha'i sgra ma'o //
T02D1409:221b-19: brgyad po 'di rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo zhal
T02D1409:221b-20: gcig pa phyag bzhi pa g-yon na kha tv'am ga
T02D1409:221b-22: g-yas na cang te'u dang gri gug bsnams pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D1409:221b-23: skra grol ba ro'i steng du g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs
T02D1409:221b-24: pa bsgom pa'o zhes pa ni rim pa bar ma'i
T02D1409:221b-26: de nas phyi rol gyi rim pa la /
T02D1409:221b-27: yi ge n'i las dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sngon mo yang dag 'byung zhes pa ni ser mo'o //
T02D1409:221b-28: rlung du yi ge dza las dra ba'i mchog ma ljang gu'o //
T02D1409:221b-29: bden bral du yi ge la las stobs 'phyang ma sngon mo'o //
T02D1409:221b-30: mer yi ge sam las bde mchog ma dmar mo'o //
T02D1409:221b-31: 'di thams cad zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa g-yon
T02D1409:221b-32: gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang thod pa lhan
T02D1409:221b-33: cig pa'i kha tv'am ga bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:221b-34: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na cang te'u dang gri gug pa bsnams pa /
T02D1409:221b-35: gcer bu ro'i gdan la g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa
T02D1409:221b-36: phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba thod pa'i phreng ba can
T02D1409:221b-37: spyan gsum pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:221b-38: de bzhin du shar gyi sgor yi ge ba las ba ra lo gra sngon mo //
T02D1409:222a-0: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang mgo bo dang sdigs mdzub @222a * //
T02D1409:222a-2: de bzhin du g-yas kyi phyag gsum na lcags kyu dang gri gug dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:222a-3: lho'i sgor ni yi ge ram las dge byed drag
T02D1409:222a-4: shul ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo zhal gsum ma
T02D1409:222a-5: zhal gyi gtso bo dkar ba /
T02D1409:222a-7: g-yon ljang gu phyag drug pa /
T02D1409:222a-8: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na thod pa dang lhan cig tu kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1409:222a-9: gri gug dang lhan cig tu sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D1409:222a-10: tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:222a-11: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na zhags pa dang /
T02D1409:222a-14: nub kyi sgor na yi ge sv'a las /
T02D1409:222a-15: rang lta bu'i dra ba dam pa ma dmar mo zhal gsum pa /
T02D1409:222a-16: zhal gyi gtso bo yid tsam dmar ba /
T02D1409:222a-17: zhal g-yon nas rim pa ji lta bar sngo ba dang ljang gu'o //
T02D1409:222a-18: phyag drug na lcags sgrog dang gri gug bsnams pa ste /
T02D1409:222a-20: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang mgo bo dang sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:222a-21: byang du yi ge h'am las do shal rnam rgyal dam pa ma ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
T02D1409:222a-23: g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal rnams ni rim pa
T02D1409:222a-24: ji lta bur ljang gu dang ser mo dang dmar
T02D1409:222a-25: mo'i mdog go // phyag drug pa g-yas kyi gsum na dril bu dang cang te'u gri gug go //
T02D1409:222a-26: de bzhin du g-yon gyi phyag gsum na sdigs mdzub dang mgo bo dang /
T02D1409:222a-27: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D1409:222a-28: brgyad po 'di rnams skra grol ba /
T02D1409:222a-30: ro'i steng du g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1409:222a-31: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1409:222a-32: phyogs kyi gos can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:222a-33: thams cad rim pa gsum na bzhugs pa /
T02D1409:222a-34: mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can nyi ma la bzhugs pa /
T02D1409:222a-35: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab yol can no //
T02D1409:222a-36: yi ge bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir drug pa'i don ni bdun pa ste /
T02D1409:222a-37: aom bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D1409:222a-38: aom bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1409:222a-39: yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'i gzugs kyis zhes
T02D1409:222a-40: bya ba la sogs pa yan chad nas ji lta
T02D1409:222a-41: bar rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1409:222a-42: gyi sngags rnams dmar po dang /
T02D1409:222a-47: du ba sngo nag gi kha dog rnams dgod par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D1409:222b-0: de dang de'i sngags rdzogs pa'i lha @222b mo dgod
T02D1409:222b-1: pa ni gang yang sgrub pa po'i mos pa dang
T02D1409:222b-2: sbyar te bstan par bya'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1409:222b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo gcig pu'am /
T02D1409:222b-4: rang gi 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i bcom ldan 'das dang
T02D1409:222b-5: lhan cig tu yid brtan par bsgoms nas zhes bya
T02D1409:222b-6: ba ni de'i lte ba la aom bam gyi sngags
T02D1409:222b-7: las skyes pa'i mdog dmar po dang /
T02D1409:222b-15: gri gug bsnams pa nyi ma la bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:222b-16: de bzhin du rim pa ji ltar snying ga dang /
T02D1409:222b-20: yan lag thams cad la gshin rje ma dang /
T02D1409:222b-24: ltung byed ma rnams ham yom /
T02D1409:222b-28: yongs su gyur pa las sngon po dang /
T02D1409:222b-29: dkar po dang ser po dang /
T02D1409:222b-36: phyag bzhi pa g-yon thod pa dang bcas pa'i kha
T02D1409:222b-37: tv'am ga dang dril bu g-yas na cang te'u dang
T02D1409:222b-39: rmongs byed ma ma gtogs pa rnams nyi ma la
T02D1409:222b-40: bzhugs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab yol dang
T02D1409:222b-41: ldan pa'o // rmongs byed ma ni zla ba la
T02D1409:222b-42: bzhugs ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab yol dang
T02D1409:222b-44: rnal 'byor ma drug gi snying po zhes bya ba
T02D1409:222b-45: ni aom bam zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags drug
T02D1409:222b-46: ste / rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa go
T02D1409:222b-47: cha drug gi sngags yongs su gyur pa la las
T02D1409:222b-48: sa bon gyi yi ge'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1409:222b-49: sa stengs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa
T02D1409:222b-50: stengs su 'jig rten pa la rab tu grags pa'i
T02D1409:222b-51: glang po dang / rta la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1409:222b-52: 'dir bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhes
T02D1409:222b-53: bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir thun mong nyid
T02D1409:222b-54: du phreng ba'i sngags la sogs pa bzung nas bstan
T02D1409:222b-55: par 'gyur ro // don dam par ni sngags brgyad yod //
T02D1409:222b-57: de la ka ra ka ra zhes bya ba la
T02D1409:222b-58: sogs pa dang lhan cig pa'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i
T02D1409:222b-59: sngags nyid btu ba bcom ldan 'das kyi phreng ba'i
T02D1409:223a-2: aom na mo bha ga ba ti badzra b'a r'a
T02D1409:223a-3: h'i pam hum h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs
T02D1409:223a-4: pa'o // 'di yang bshad pa'i rgyud du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1409:223a-5: aom shr'i badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan
T02D1409:223a-6: ma thag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o
T02D1409:223a-7: // bcom ldan 'das ma'i ni aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1409:223a-8: aom hr'i: ha ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1409:223a-9: ni rim par phye ba bcu pa las bstan par
T02D1409:223a-10: bya ste / bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1409:223a-11: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye zhes bya ba
T02D1409:223a-12: la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i nye ba'i
T02D1409:223a-13: snying po'o // aom ha na ma: hi la sogs pa'i go cha ni bcom ldan 'das kyi'o //
T02D1409:223a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma'i bstan ma thag pa nyid kyis
T02D1409:223a-15: sngags aom bam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i go
T02D1409:223a-17: sngags bzhi po thun mong du rin chen bzhi zhes pa'i dgongs pa'o //
T02D1409:223a-18: rin chen bzhi po 'di las phreng ba'i sngags dam pa yin no //
T02D1409:223a-19: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma la rdo rje
T02D1409:223a-20: phag mo rig pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i ming
T02D1409:223a-21: gzhan no // bcom ldan 'das kyang he ru ka'i
T02D1409:223a-22: rig pa'i rgyal po ming gi dam pa zhes bya
T02D1409:223a-24: rin chen bzhi can zhes brjod par ro //
T02D1409:223a-25: rin chen bzhi po zhes gang las sha na /
T02D1409:223a-27: rgyud las sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par bya
T02D1409:223a-28: ba'i don la sogs par rnam par phye ste nges
T02D1409:223a-29: par bstan pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1409:223a-30: rtags nges par bstan pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1409:223a-31: 'di gnyis kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po
T02D1409:223a-32: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzhi rin chen bzhi zhes bstan
T02D1409:223a-33: par bya'o // phyogs 'dir sngags 'di'i rin po che'i
T02D1409:223a-34: sgra'i tshig gang dang gang zhig gzhan gyi phreng ba'i
T02D1409:223a-35: sngags sa stengs na dam pa yin no //
T02D1409:223a-36: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma dang /
T02D1409:223a-37: bcom ldan 'das dam pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1409:223a-38: 'di ni rim par phye ba brgyad pa'o /
T02D1409:223a-40: // / rtsa ba'i sngags zhes pa ni //
T02D1409:223a-41: rigs zhes pa'i sngags gzhan las gsungs pa /
T02D1409:223a-42: ji srid du rtsa ba'i sngags zhes pa'i brjod pa
T02D1409:223a-43: de srid du yang phreng ba'i sngags nyid du dgongs
T02D1409:223a-45: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1409:223a-46: go sla'o zhes pa ni sngags 'di 'dod pa'i don
T02D1409:223a-47: to // las rnams thams cad byed pa'o //
T02D1409:223a-48: zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1409:223b-0: @223b 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1409:223b-1: 'di'i yang shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni klu thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1409:223b-2: gsod par byed do zhes pa yan chad kyi bar du'o //
T02D1409:223b-3: lha thams cad kyi skye gnas zhes bya ba la
T02D1409:223b-4: sogs pa ni klu thams cad la sogs pa'i yang
T02D1409:223b-5: lha thams cad kyi skye gnas smos pas kyang 'grub
T02D1409:223b-6: po // lha thams cad kyi skye gnas zhes slar
T02D1409:223b-7: brjod pa ni shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i don
T02D1409:223b-9: dang po'i sgra ji bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni 'di'i man ngag ni 'di yin te /
T02D1409:223b-10: skad cig gis padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bltas la
T02D1409:223b-11: de'i lte ba la rje btsun rdo rje khyung zhes
T02D1409:223b-12: bya ba sku mdog nag po mche ba gtsigs shing
T02D1409:223b-15: khro bo lo bcu drug lon pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:223b-16: de'i zhal dang po mthing nag /
T02D1409:223b-19: steng gi nam mkha' lding gi zhal dmar ba nyi
T02D1409:223b-20: ma bcu gnyis sam zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i
T02D1409:223b-21: zhal re re la spyan gsum pa /
T02D1409:223b-22: g-yas kyi phyag na rdo rje gsor ba /
T02D1409:223b-23: gzhan g-yon na zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub bsnams pa /
T02D1409:223b-24: g-yas dang g-yon na gzhan dag gis dbang po'i pags
T02D1409:223b-25: pa man bas pa'i tshul du bsnams pa de bzhin
T02D1409:223b-26: du rim pa ji lta bar thod pa dang kha
T02D1409:223b-28: de bzhin du lcags kyu dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:223b-30: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas cod pan la nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D1409:223b-31: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can /
T02D1409:223b-32: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can ya sos ma mchu mnan na pa /
T02D1409:223b-33: zhabs g-yas brkyang bas chu bdag mdog dkar po mnan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:223b-34: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D1409:223b-35: la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtha' yas
T02D1409:223b-36: dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
T02D1409:223b-38: padma rnams la ni dkar po dang /
T02D1409:223b-41: de bzhin du dbang ldan dang /

T02D1409:236b-33: dngos grub thams cad ces pa ni sa 'og la

T02D1409:236b-35: ba yin no // 'di ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o /
T02D1409:236b-37: // / nges par sbyar ba zhes pa ni gnas ji lta bar nges par sbyar te mchod par bya'o //
T02D1409:236b-39: 'khor lo gsum mchod par bya'o zhes pa yin no //
T02D1409:236b-40: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1409:236b-41: de zhes pa ni sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1409:236b-42: rtsibs cher zhes pa ni dka' 'grel las rnam par bshad do //
T02D1409:236b-43: lte bar zhes pa ni 'dir yi ge yang blta bar bya'o //
T02D1409:237a-2: 'di nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1409:237a-3: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D1409:237a-4: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa gnas ji lta bar nges par dgod par bya ba yin no //
T02D1409:237a-5: nges par gzhag ces bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1409:237a-6: dpral ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'i 'od
T02D1409:237a-7: zer rnams rdzogs pa aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas na
T02D1409:237a-8: gnas pa rnam pa thams cad mthong ba de'i mi
T02D1409:237a-9: bzad pa'i spyan gsum pa zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod
T02D1409:237a-10: pa dpa' bo la sogs pa 'di rnams thams cad
T02D1409:237a-11: la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1409:237a-12: bza' ba zhes pa ni bza' ba ji ltar shes pa'o zhe'o //
T02D1409:237a-13: dka' 'grel las kyang ji ltar rnyed pa'i sha yis zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad do //
T02D1409:237a-14: las dang rjes su mthun pas zhes pa ni thab
T02D1409:237a-15: khung gi nang du skad cig gis rdo rje sems
T02D1409:237a-16: dpa' ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid du ldan
T02D1409:237a-17: pa skyil krung du bzhugs pas blta ste /
T02D1409:237a-18: shes rab dang bcas pa zhu bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:237a-19: de nas de zhu bar gyur pa ram gyi sa
T02D1409:237a-20: bon las yang dag par byung ba kun du gtum
T02D1409:237a-21: par byed pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D1409:237a-22: sku mdog nag po thung ba spyan gsum pa /
T02D1409:237a-23: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1409:237a-24: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na bgrang phreng dang mi 'jigs pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1409:237a-25: phyag g-yon pa gnyis na thod pa'i snod dang dbyug pa //
T02D1409:237a-26: phyag g-yas dang g-yon dag gis rang gi rig ma
T02D1409:237a-27: las 'khyud pa gdug pa'i me lha rnam par bsgom
T02D1409:237a-28: par bya'o // de'i lce la ram bltas la ba lang gi sha dang /
T02D1409:237a-31: khrag rnams myos byed kyi 'dab ma'i khu bas spags te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1409:237a-33: dbang dang dgug pa dag la dmar po'o //
T02D1409:237a-34: rgyas pa dang rengs pa dag la ser po rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1409:237a-35: sngar gyi bzhin du lce la yi ge ram bltas te /
T02D1409:237a-36: de'i kha la bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri
T02D1409:237a-37: zhim po'i chus sbags pa'i ba lang gi sha'i sbyin
T02D1409:237a-39: shin tu 'bar ba'i mer zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1409:237a-40: ni gdug pa mtha' dag gi las la nim pa
T02D1409:237a-43: balla ta ka'i yam shing rnams la /
T02D1409:237a-45: khrag dang dug gis sbags te /
T02D1409:237b-0: sor mo bcu bcu'i tshad rnams @237b kyis yungs mar dang /
T02D1409:237b-17: mi'i rus pa dang bcas pas me sbar bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:237b-22: dgug pa rnams la pa la sha'i shing dang pa la ksha dang /
T02D1409:237b-30: byang chub kyi shing gi yam shing rnams bdud rtsi
T02D1409:237b-31: rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa'i dri chus spags la
T02D1409:237b-32: mdzub mo'i mtho gang gi tshad rnams kyis zho dang
T02D1409:237b-37: mon sran sde'u dang bcas pa rnams kyis me sbar bar bya ba yin no //
T02D1409:237b-38: rgyab kyi 'dab ma la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:237b-39: las dang rjes su mthun pas zhes pa ni mjug
T02D1409:237b-40: thogs su 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim par phye ba
T02D1409:237b-41: gsungs pa / rim pa las ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1409:237b-42: du phyag mtshan bya zhing khanda ro ha bya'o zhes

T02D1409:237b-45: khanda ro ha rang gi gnas su blta bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:237b-46: pho nya gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di thams cad kyi lam dang /
T02D1409:237b-47: shes rab dang bcas pa'i sngags pas byed pa de
T02D1409:237b-48: yis 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin
T02D1409:237b-49: no // 'di ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o /
T02D1409:237b-51: // / khanda ro ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1409:237b-52: ni las kyi sgra smos pas thun mong ba'i bya
T02D1409:237b-53: ba gnyis te / sngags bzlas pa dang /
T02D1409:237b-54: khanda ro ha'i bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1409:237b-55: de nyid mchog ste dam pa thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1409:237b-56: rab ces pa ni shin tu thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02D1409:237b-57: ji bzhin rim gyis mtshan ma ste //
T02D1409:237b-58: zhes pa ni go rims su rim gyis so //
T02D1409:237b-59: gang zhig sngags kyi bzlas pa rim gyis sa dang /
T02D1409:237b-60: gang zhig 'dra ba'i khanda ro ha'i bya ba'i rim
T02D1409:237b-61: gyis de dag gi phyir mtshon zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1409:237b-62: to // yang de las gnyis ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
T02D1409:237b-64: mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag / ces pa ste /
T02D1409:238a-2: de'i don du thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1409:238a-3: de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1409:238a-4: shes rab dang bcas pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:238a-5: bya'o zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1409:238a-6: dang por re zhig sngags kyi bzlas brjod gsungs pa /
T02D1409:238a-7: las ni so sor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:238a-8: las so so zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las so //
T02D1409:238a-9: sbyar bar bya zhes pa ni bar du ldan pa'o //
T02D1409:238a-10: 'grub par byed pa zhes pa ni 'jig rten gsum
T02D1409:238a-11: du rab tu grags pa'i phreng ba'i sngags la sogs
T02D1409:238a-12: pa'o // de'i dbye ba zhes pa ni las kyi bye brag las bzlas pa'i bye brag go /
T02D1409:238a-13: rim pa ji bzhin zhes pa ni rim par brgyud
T02D1409:238a-14: pa de'i rim pas bshad ces bya bar sbyar ro
T02D1409:238a-16: yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:238a-17: yi ge ni yi ge aa la sogs pa nas ksha'i bar du'o //
T02D1409:238a-18: pho nya mo ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa
T02D1409:238a-19: nas gshin rje brtan ma la thug pa'i bar gyi
T02D1409:238a-20: rnal 'byor ma'o // sogs pa smos pas dpa' bo
T02D1409:238a-21: rnams la bcom ldan 'das ma phag mo dang bcas
T02D1409:238a-23: 'di rnams kyi sngags gang zhig so so rang gi der go bar bya'o //
T02D1409:238a-24: de'i sngags mda'i shugs kyis yongs su 'khor ba ni
T02D1409:238a-25: ji ltar gzhu bkang ste mnga' rgyang 'phangs pa'i shugs
T02D1409:238a-26: cher 'gro ba de bzhin du shugs kyis myur du
T02D1409:238a-27: yongs su 'khor bar zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:238a-28: sngags de ji lta bur gyur nas yongs su 'khor zhing 'gro zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1409:238a-29: phan tshun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:238a-31: sa bon phreng ba la sogs pas gdug pa can
T02D1409:238a-32: gyi khyad par gsungs pa dka' 'grel las bshad pa
T02D1409:238a-33: nyid do // dgag par bya zhes pa ni rnam par 'chad pa'o //
T02D1409:238a-34: sngags bstan pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1409:238a-35: zhes pa ni sngags las lung bstan pa 'jig rten
T02D1409:238a-36: pa la yang rab tu grags pa nyid kyi kha
T02D1409:238a-38: zhi ba'i sngags kyi kha sbyor bstan nas /
T02D1409:238a-39: de nyid dgug pa'i las la yang //
T02D1409:238a-40: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings la //
T02D1409:238a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1409:238a-43: kha sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1409:238a-44: da ni khanda ro ha'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1409:238b-0: gsungs pa dgug par @238b zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1409:238b-1: pa ste / lo ma la bkod pas sngags spel
T02D1409:238b-2: zhes pa ni ji ltar lo 'dab kyi phyi shun
T02D1409:238b-3: pa ste / dang / de las nang rim dang yang nang shun no //
T02D1409:238b-4: de bzhin du 'dir yang dang po'i sngags /
T02D1409:238b-5: de nas bsgrub bya'i ming dang /
T02D1409:238b-6: de nas sngags so zhes dgongs so //
T02D1409:238b-7: thod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thod
T02D1409:238b-8: par bdud rtsi lngas yongs su bkang bas khanda ro
T02D1409:238b-9: ha'i zhal du mchod yon phul nas mtshon cha rnams
T02D1409:238b-10: kyi nges par sbyar ba la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i
T02D1409:238b-11: don to // sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba zhes
T02D1409:238b-12: bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags kyi mthar che
T02D1409:238b-13: ge mo m'a ra ya zhes pas mtha' brtan pa'i
T02D1409:238b-15: lhan cig mtshon cha sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1409:238b-16: yang na ji ltar bzlas pa'i skabs su sngags kyi
T02D1409:238b-17: phreng ba rang gi kha'i nang du zhugs pa de
T02D1409:238b-18: bzhin du khanda ro ha'i zhal gyi nang du mchod
T02D1409:238b-19: yon gyi dus su sngags zhugs par bsgom par bya
T02D1409:238b-20: ba yin no // 'di dag ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o /
T02D1409:238b-22: // / phyag rgya rang zhes pa ni gzhan gyi grub
T02D1409:238b-23: pa'i mtha' la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1409:238b-25: zas las zhes pa ni ji ltar gdug par bya ba'i sngags kyi brjod pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1409:238b-26: rdo rje yis ni gzung bar bya //
T02D1409:238b-27: zhes bya smos pa 'dis khanda ro ha'i bya ba bstan to //
T02D1409:238b-28: de bzhin du 'di las de gnyis kar bya ba yin no zhes dgongs so //
T02D1409:238b-29: 'di rnams kyi don nyid ni dka' 'grel las kyang bstan to //
T02D1409:238b-30: rnal 'byor ma snyan gsan dbab pa zhes pa ni
T02D1409:238b-31: mtshan mo'i dus su me tog sbyin pa sngon du
T02D1409:238b-32: 'gro bas rnal 'byor ma mtshan mor snyan mnan no
T02D1409:238b-33: // dag pa'i lus zhes pa ni yun ring por bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1409:238b-34: ji ltar 'dod pa zhes pa ni 'byor ba'i tshul
T02D1409:238b-35: dang mthun par 'dod tshad du bcu 'am bco lnga
T02D1409:238b-37: rjes thogs su tshes bcu 'am brgyad la nang bar
T02D1409:238b-38: tho rangs tshogs kyi bza' bar gsungs pa dpa' bo
T02D1409:238b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dka' 'grel las
T02D1409:238b-40: go sla'o // las thams cad kyi thun mong du
T02D1409:238b-41: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor ma la bsrung bar bya'o
T02D1409:238b-42: zhes bya ba'i tshig de bzhin du bsrung zhing snyoms
T02D1409:238b-43: par 'jug par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:239a-2: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa drug pa'o /
T02D1409:239a-4: // / gal te rtag tu khros zhes pa ni bsgrub
T02D1409:239a-5: bya la khros par 'gyur ba de srid la gtang
T02D1409:239a-6: bar gyur pa de srid du las gtang bar mi
T02D1409:239a-7: bya ste / de ni phyin ci log gi las su mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:239a-8: bshang lam las 'byung ba zhes pa ni gsang ba'i lam nas phyi rol du byung ba'o //
T02D1409:239a-9: 'di yang lto ba'i srin bu'i khyad par ro //
T02D1409:239a-11: de'i mdun du zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg gi
T02D1409:239a-12: thab khung gi dbus su son pa der dpal he
T02D1409:239a-13: ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa blta zhes pa'i don
T02D1409:239a-14: to // sngags pas gang 'dod de bzhin du //
T02D1409:239a-15: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po 'dod pa la rag
T02D1409:239a-16: las pa tsam gyis sgrub pa yin zhes dgongs pa'o
T02D1409:239a-17: // dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ces pa ni
T02D1409:239a-18: dam tshig la sbyor bas na dam tshig ste sgrub
T02D1409:239a-19: // pa po'o // de'i spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba'i tshul rjes thogs su bshad zin to //
T02D1409:239a-21: sngags zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyis so //
T02D1409:239a-22: 'di skal ba dman pa rnams kyi yang yul du ma gyur pa gsungs pa /
T02D1409:239a-23: mthong mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1409:239a-24: skal ba dman pa'i skye bo la 'di gsang bas
T02D1409:239a-25: na mi rnyed pa dang mi mthong bar 'gyur la
T02D1409:239a-26: nga mnyes pas 'thob bo zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1409:239a-28: sgrub pa pos kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1409:239a-29: 'di ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o /
T02D1409:239a-31: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'grub
T02D1409:239a-32: par 'gyur zhes pa ni rab tu grags par 'gyur
T02D1409:239a-33: pa nyid thams cad sngar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1409:239a-34: 'di'i dgongs pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams las brda rnams dang /
T02D1409:239a-35: dpa' bo'i lus kyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i dam tshig rnams kyi spyod yul du bya'o //
T02D1409:239a-37: sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sba bar bya bas na sba bar bya'o //
T02D1409:239a-38: phyin ci log la skyon gsungs pa /
T02D1409:239a-39: mi gdon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:239a-40: g-yon spyod ces pa ni rnal 'byor ma mnyes pa'i don du g-yon na spyod pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1409:239a-41: yang na 'dis ci bstan pa yin pas na g-yon pas so //
T02D1409:239a-42: gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ces pa ni gnyis pa mtha' ma phyis pa'i tshig go //
T02D1409:239a-43: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1409:239b-0: de la zhes @239b pa ni de la'o //
T02D1409:239b-1: mkha' 'gro ma stong phrag ces pa ni dang po'i don gyis gsum pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-2: zos pa la zhes pa ni zos pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-3: de bzhin du thams cad kyi gnyis pa'i don gyis dang po'o //
T02D1409:239b-4: gsang ba zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02D1409:239b-5: phyugs zhes pa ni phyugs dang 'dra bas bza' bar 'os pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1409:239b-6: phyin ci ma log pa las yon tan gsungs pa /
T02D1409:239b-7: gang zhig bslu bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:239b-8: mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1409:239b-9: phag mo la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo
T02D1409:239b-10: kun rnams so // de la zhes pa ni bla ma'i zhal de'i'o //
T02D1409:239b-11: gsang ba zhes pa ni bsdams shing bsdams pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-12: dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa zhes pa ni dpa' bo
T02D1409:239b-13: nyid la gang gis som nyi yod pa de dpa'
T02D1409:239b-14: bo'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa ste drug pa'i don
T02D1409:239b-15: to // sngags 'di yis zhes pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur pa yis so //
T02D1409:239b-16: bstod par bya zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1409:239b-17: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1409:239b-18: pho nya rnams dang lhan cig gnas //
T02D1409:239b-19: zhes pa ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun dang lhan cig tu'o //
T02D1409:239b-20: de nas zhes pa ni rgyu gang gis de dang de bsrung ba'i rgyu de yis //
T02D1409:239b-21: thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1409:239b-22: kun du zhen par blta la gnas //
T02D1409:239b-24: bsod nams thob pa yin zhes pa ni bsod nams gzigs pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-25: rnal 'byor ma dang gsang ba'i mi //
T02D1409:239b-26: zhes pa ni dam tshig yongs su bskang bar bya ba'i phyir na'o //
T02D1409:239b-27: gsang ba'i mi'i bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1409:239b-28: rnal 'byor ma dang mi zhes pa dang /
T02D1409:239b-29: lhan cig tu zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-30: 'di ni rim par phye ba sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o /
T02D1409:239b-32: // / mda' zhes pa ni ka ni bde ba'o //
T02D1409:239b-33: sgo nga ni gnas yin te gnas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1409:239b-34: tshogs zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di zhes pa ste tshogs pa phag mo'o //
T02D1409:239b-35: 'dir sngags dang lha dag tha mi dad pa yin
T02D1409:239b-36: pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1409:239b-37: dang bcom ldan 'das ma dag gis rtsa ba'i sngags
T02D1409:239b-38: gsungs pa // gnyi ga zhes pa ni drug pa'i don gyis gsum pa'o //
T02D1409:239b-39: gnyis ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags yang dag par bsgoms pa
T02D1409:239b-40: so sor rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1409:240a-2: de de ltar na dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dka' 'grel las bshad do //
T02D1409:240a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gzhan no //
T02D1409:240a-4: grub ces pa ni nus pa skyes pa'o /
T02D1409:240a-5: de de ltar na rnal 'byor che /
T02D1409:240a-6: sngags zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i sngags gnyis so //
T02D1409:240a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1409:240a-11: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1409:240a-12: 'jigs pa zhes pa ni 'jigs pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1409:240a-13: 'jigs pa med pa'i don ni 'bras bu gsungs pa g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1409:240a-14: sgrub pa po zhes pa ni sgrub pa po'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1409:240a-15: sngags lus can zhes pa ni drug pa'i dang po'i to //
T02D1409:240a-16: 'di dag ni rim par phye ba sum cu rta dgu ba'o /
T02D1409:240a-18: // / dpa' bo rnal 'byor sngags kyi cho gas gnas
T02D1409:240a-19: zhes pa ni dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das so
T02D1409:240a-20: // rnal 'byor ni de'i rnam par bskyed pas so //
T02D1409:240a-21: sngags ni rkang pa brgyad pa'o //
T02D1409:240a-22: de'i cho ga ni byin gyis brlabs so //
